response.overview: Salt-of-the-earth Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie—but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.
response.tagline: Meeting that special someone can be a real adventure.
response.title: Ghosted

results.name: A Conversation with Chris Evans & Ana de Armas
